snippet: A trade group sued the city of Seattle on Wednesday, seeking to block a sharp hike in the minimum wage to $15 an hour over the next seven years on the grounds that it unfairly favors small businesses over larger employers and franchises....

headline.print_headline: Trade Group, Franchisees Sue to Block Seattle Minimum Wage Hike
headline.main: Trade Group, Franchisees Sue to Block Seattle Minimum Wage Hike

lead_paragraph: A trade group sued the city of Seattle on Wednesday, seeking to block a sharp hike in the minimum wage to $15 an hour over the next seven years on the grounds that it unfairly favors small businesses over larger employers and franchises.
